body_html:
The relevant error lines in the config.log are these:

configure:3873: gcc -DNDEBUG -Os -pipe -fPIC -fno-exceptions -mwatchos-version-min= -arch armv7k -fembed-bitcode -isysroot   -arch armv7k -fembed-bitcode -mwatchos-version-min= -stdlib=libc++ conftest.c -lc++ -lc++abi >&5
clang: error: no such file or directory: 'armv7k'
clang: warning: no such sysroot directory: '-arch'
clang: error: invalid version number in '-mwatchos-version-min='

I'm not sure where these errors are coming from, but hopefully you can trace them back (I think it should be -arch=armv7k for example).

body:
The relevant error lines in the config.log are these:

```
configure:3873: gcc -DNDEBUG -Os -pipe -fPIC -fno-exceptions -mwatchos-version-min= -arch armv7k -fembed-bitcode -isysroot   -arch armv7k -fembed-bitcode -mwatchos-version-min= -stdlib=libc++ conftest.c -lc++ -lc++abi >&5
clang: error: no such file or directory: 'armv7k'
clang: warning: no such sysroot directory: '-arch'
clang: error: invalid version number in '-mwatchos-version-min='
```

I'm not sure where these errors are coming from, but hopefully you can trace them back (I think it should be -arch=armv7k for example).
